body: Additional context: this is necessary to help migrate existing AOSP users using a custom `atest` tool which prints the results of all test cases, even for passing tests, to use bazel as the test runner and results reporter.
That sounds like a very reasonable approach.
@NelsonLi0701 do you want to try implementing this and contribute to Bazel?

Thanks, assigning it to you. When you have the pull request ready, send it to me and @lberki.

Let me know if you need pointers on setting up the Bazel project for development.

rename.from: Print the test methods when running `bazel test`
rename.to: Print successful test methods when running `bazel test --test_summary=detailed`

body:

Could you help me to see how to fix it?
